Html:
I get the follwing error when building the App (VS2008)

Error 1 Could not load type 'NerdDinner.MvcApplication'. D:\NerdDinner\NerdDinner\Global.asax 1 

Any idea??

Best regards
Sooriya

SOLVED:    It was me... You need to open the site as a "NEW Project"  not as "NEW WEB Site"..
Thanks for coming back and giving us the solution!
